author: Vipal Monga
title: What’s That Thing You’re Sending an Email With? Um, It’s a BlackBerry
text:
Magnus Jern was sitting around with some programmers at Google headquarters when he remembered he needed to answer an email. But when he pulled out his phone and started tapping, the room grew silent. 
“What is that?” one woman asked.

The reaction was no surprise to Mr. Jern, part of a die-hard band devoted to a device that was once a status... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
